about_the_game:
-- Please note that Shadows of Revenge is currently in Early Access. You may experience incomplete features, evolving gameplay, and the exciting opportunity to shape the game's development. We invite you to join our community and provide feedback as we grow! --


Enter the shadowy realm of "Shadows of Revenge," a gripping roguelike deckbuilding game set in the treacherous mafia underworld of Manhattan. Assume the role of a disgraced family boss, driven by the thirst for power and redemption, as you engage in intense neighborhood-by-neighborhood combat and fend off rival mafia families seeking to reclaim their territories. Craft a cunning deck of loyal gang members, navigate through a city tainted by corruption, and decide the fate of your family in this strategic, blood-soaked journey to rule the mafia realm.

Overview


Shadows of Revenge puts you into the sinister heart of a mafia-dominated Manhattan. As the boss of a once-proud family now fallen into disgrace, your journey to reclaim the city will test your wit, resourcefulness and determination.

Key Features


  • Deck Building: Craft a lethal deck of unique cards, each representing a key member of your "famiglia" or a weapon. Utilize their distinct abilities to gain an edge in intense turn-based battles.

  • Map Strategy and Domination: Strategize your takeover of Manhattan's neighborhoods, engaging in tactical combat per territory. Survey the city map, plan your moves, and dominate rival mafia factions to extend your influence.

  • Defend Conquered Neighborhoods: Be aware that after you conquer a territory, "they" will want to get it back.

  • Replayability: We're working our best to give you unlimited replayability. The map distribution changes every run you play and your strategy should adapt to it.

content_descriptors.notes:
This is a story about revenge and mafia. It's a glorified vision of an awful reality of some people. It's a love letter to mafia stories and movies.

If you're sensitive to or triggered by violence or revenge or mafia, please skip this game.
